statements: SELECT * FROM audience_data;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM audience_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM audience_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, interests FROM audience_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, age, interests FROM audience_data ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM audience_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM audience_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, age, interests FROM audience_data WHERE interests LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM audience_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM audience_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 30 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM audience_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT id, name, interests FROM audience_data WHERE interests LIKE '%music%'
SELECT user_id, recommendation FROM video_recommendations ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM audience_data WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT MAX(age) as max_age, MIN(age) as min_age FROM audience_data
SELECT * FROM audience_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC, id
SELECT id, name, age FROM audience_data WHERE interests LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT user_id, recommendation FROM video_recommendations WHERE video_id = 1234 ORDER BY user_id, id DESC
SELECT * FROM audience_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC, id
SELECT id, name FROM audience_data WHERE interests = 'sports' ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM AudienceData;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM AudienceData WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, interests FROM AudienceData WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT video_id, title, category FROM VideoRecommendations WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT video_id, length FROM VideoRecommendations ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT * FROM AudienceData WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, interests[1] as main_interest, location FROM AudienceData WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM VideoRecommendations WHERE category='Action' AND rating > 4.5 ORDER BY length ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, video_id, action FROM UserInteractions WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM AudienceData JOIN UserInteractions ON AudienceData.user_id = UserInteractions.user_id WHERE AudienceData.age < 25 AND action='like';
SELECT * FROM Audience;
SELECT title, genre FROM Videos ORDER BY genre ASC;
SELECT audience_id, gender FROM Audience WHERE age > 30;
SELECT video_id, duration FROM Videos WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT audience_id, video_id, timestamp FROM Interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Audience;
SELECT video_id, title, genre FROM Videos WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT audience_id, gender, location FROM Audience WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT video_id, title, duration FROM Videos WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT r.recommendation_id, v.title, a.gender FROM Recommendations r JOIN Videos v ON r.video_id = v.video_id JOIN Audience a ON r.audience_id = a.audience_id;
SELECT * FROM audience_segment;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM audience_segment ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, segment_description FROM audience_segment WHERE segment_id > 100;
SELECT username, email, age FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT video_title, duration, category FROM video_metadata WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY video_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM audience_segment WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(segment_name) > 10 ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM user_profile WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT video_title, category, genre FROM video_metadata WHERE category = 'Comedy' AND genre = 'Romantic' ORDER BY video_title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, recommended_video_id, timestamp FROM recommendation_system ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
